name: Magister
aura: Increases Ally HP in Faction Crypts by 22%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. If the hit is critical, places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on a random ally for 1 turn.
skills.name: Majestic Staff
skills.books:

Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Places a [Revive On Death] buff and a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on a target ally for 2 turns. Heals all other allies by 10% of the target's HP.
skills.name: Anoint
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Heal +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
